summary: Implement money withdrawal feature for Habitto users
description:
Users should be able to withdraw their earnings from their Habitto account to their bank account or digital wallet. The system should handle identity verification, fraud detection, and regulatory compliance.

Requirements:
- Support bank transfer and digital wallet withdrawals
- Minimum withdrawal amount of $10, maximum of $5000 per day
- Identity verification required for withdrawals over $100
- Real-time fraud detection and risk assessment
- Withdrawal processing within 1-3 business days
- Email notifications for withdrawal status updates

Acceptance Criteria:
- User can initiate withdrawal request from dashboard
- System validates withdrawal amount against limits and balance
- Identity verification flow is triggered when required
- Withdrawal status is tracked and displayed to user
- Fees are calculated and disclosed before confirmation
- Compliance reporting is generated for regulatory requirements

Figma Design: https://www.figma.com/file/def789/withdrawal-flow

comments.body: This feature must comply with anti-money laundering regulations and fraud prevention requirements.
Need to ensure withdrawal limits are configurable for different user tiers.
